synopsis.text:
Zhui Lau and Naito Kijima, two escapees from a ruthless laboratory, find themselves at the heart of a gripping tale that runs parallel to the events of the Sacred Seven TV series. The laboratory's cold experiments revolve around the mysterious Sacred Seven crystals and their effects on humans, making the duo's struggle for freedom even more harrowing.

In this special edition, the fierce battles of Alma and Knight take center stage, with new animations shedding light on Knight's enigmatic past. The narrative delves deeper into the intense clashes between Alma and Naito, offering a fresh perspective from Naito's viewpoint.

The re-edited version of the anime promises a richer experience with newly added scenes that delve into Naito's history, complemented by a fresh recording of dialogue. This unique blend of old and new elements invites viewers to explore the intricate world of Sacred Seven from a whole new angle.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
